scripts.test:sandbox: npm run build && npm run clean:sandbox && npm run link:schematic && npm run sandbox:add-all
scripts.link:schematic: npm link && cd sandbox && npm link "schematics"
scripts.clean:sandbox: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -fd sandbox
scripts.sandbox:add-all: cd sandbox && ng g schematics:add-odin && ng g schematics:add-ids
